detail_desc: High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Metal hair grips decorated with small metal spiders and faceted stones. Length 5 cm.

Calf-length dress in a crinkled weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, and flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Elasticated seam and tie belt below the bust, and a double layer at the front with deep armholes and a wrapover lining for easier nursing access. Lined.
V-neck top in soft slub jersey with short sleeves, a seam centre back and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Pyjama bottoms in fleece with a ribbed elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. Detachable, adjustable braces.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.

Fitted, quilted, lightweight jacket with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front and front pockets. Filling 80% down and 20% feathers. Supplied with a practical storage bag with an elasticated drawstring. Size of bag 11x24.5 cm.
Fitted knee-length skirt in jersey with wide ribbing at the waist for best fit, and a slit at the back.
Briefs in an airy silk blend with a low waist with lace-covered elastication.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a sheen, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and appliqué on the chest. Pockets in the side seams, a zipped inner pocket, zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Chelsea boots in grained imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the top. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Jacket in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an unlined hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Gently flared vest top in jersey with a sheen. Narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Lined at the top.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sweatpants in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Crop tops in soft cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps.

Underwired bikini top with lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and good support. Shoulder straps that can be tied at the shoulders or back of the neck and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Boxy, slightly shorter jacket in organic cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and flap chest pockets with a button.

Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a narrow, rounded collar and ties at the neck. Buttons down the front, a lace frill at the top that continues over the shoulders, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a scalloped lace trim.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. T-shirt top with ribbing around the neckline. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Fancy dress costume in jersey designed for a small dog. Lined hood with antennae, wings on the back, a hook and loop fastening at the neckline, ribbed sections around the front legs and an elasticated hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shortie briefs in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back. The cotton content of the briefs is organic.
V-neck blouse in twill made from a modal and cotton blend with an elasticated, frilled collar with tasselled ties and wide raglan sleeves with elastication and broderie anglaise at the cuffs.
Court shoes in imitation patent leather with block heels and square toes. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester, and insoles in imitation leather. Heel 9 cm.

Cape in jersey with a gold-coloured foil print, embroidered details and felt appliqués. Lined hood that is padded at the top, a hook and loop fastening at the neckline and elastic loops for the hands at the sides. Detachable tail with a hook and loop fastening at the back.

Single-breasted jacket in an Italian wool weave with notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons down the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette. For matching trousers, look for: 0507864.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 50x50 cm.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Set with a shirt, slipover and bow tie or tie. Shirt in a cotton weave with a narrow turn-down collar and long sleeves. V-neck slipover in fine-knit cotton with ribbed edges. Pre-tied bow tie/tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
V-neck blouse in an airy, striped weave with a pleat at the front, long, wide sleeves with wide cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Trainers in a cotton weave with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with an opening at the top with ties at the front, long sleeves with a gathered seam and wide, buttoned cuffs.
Treggings in stretch twill with a small glittery heart at the top, an elasticated waist, a fake fly and fake front pockets.
Padded bomber jacket with a ribbed collar, zip at the front, zipped side pockets, a pocket on the sleeve, one inner pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in organic cotton denim with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button, and extra-wide legs that taper to the hems.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in an airy viscose weave with a lace-trimmed stand-up collar and buttons at the top. Pin-tucks with lace trims at the front, an elasticated seam with a decorative drawstring under the bust, and a gently draping, flared skirt. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Short skirt in sturdy, patterned satin with a high waist, pleats at the top, a visible zip at the back and side pockets. Unlined.
Heart-shaped bag in imitation patent leather and imitation suede with a zip and shoulder strap at the top. Lined. Size 4x17 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, wide sides and a high cut at the back.
Fine-knit sports socks with a short ribbed shaft. The polyester content of the socks is partly recycled.
Short, fitted dress in washed, stretch denim with wide shoulder straps and offset buttons down the front. Unlined.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a V-neck, decorative gathers at the top, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in airy linen. Relaxed fit with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets, a fake back pocket, and gently tapered legs.
Short-sleeved top in cool jersey made from a viscose blend with a round neckline and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey in various designs with press-studs down the front that continue along one leg. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text print. Double-layered drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully-lined bikini. V-neck top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Matching bottoms.
Set with a long-sleeved top and dungaree dress in jersey. Printed top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Dress with an elasticated waist and straps that cross at the back.
Half-shaft wellingtons with a loop at the back, fabric linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Jumper in a rib-knit viscose blend with a slight sheen. V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front with a large, decorative metal button, and short sleeves.
Slightly wider leather belt with an antiqued metal buckle. Width 4.5 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a flounce at the waist.
Wide trousers in twill with a high waist and belt, pleats at the top and zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Bolero in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads with a button at the neck and long sleeves with roll edges.
Trainers in imitation suede with lacing at the front, fabric linings and insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave with smocking over the bust and a small frill trim at the top. Tie-top shoulder straps and decorative pearly buttons down the front.
Jersey top in a soft silk and cotton blend with narrow shoulder straps.
Jacket in soft velour with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, zip down the front, raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Tops in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.

Long, lightly padded parka in cotton twill with a faux fur-lined hood, stand-up collar and zip with a wind flap and concealed press-studs down the front. Drawstring at the waist, side pockets with a button, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Quilted lining.
T-shirt in airy jersey with decorative seams at the front and a slightly wider neckline.
Calf-length skirt in imitation leather with a high waist, buttons centre front and fake front pockets with a decorative flap. Lined.
Dungaree dress in washed, stretch twill with buttons down the front, adjustable straps with metal fasteners and diagonal side pockets. Unlined.

Set with a T-shirt and shorts in cotton. T-shirt in jersey with a print motif. Knee-length, 5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and press-stud.

Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and covered buttons at the top. Smocking with gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Knee-length shorts in soft washed cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Short, fitted, airy top in patterned mesh with long sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft, textured fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Long-sleeved Henley top in organic slub cotton jersey with a button placket and a woven yoke.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in ribbed organic cotton jersey with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with decorative buttons.
Oversized jumper in a jacquard knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Soft, non-wired mesh bra with overlocked edges, lined cups and adjustable spaghetti straps. Wide elastic at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
